product_families.description: Polythene Insulated Jelly Filled Armoured Telecom Cables

technical_specifications.insulation_material: Solid Polythene (ASTMD-1248 Type-II or III, Class-A cat.4 or 5)
technical_specifications.filling_compound: Petroleum Jelly (Homogenous, anti-oxidant, water-resistant, compatible with insulation)
technical_specifications.moisture_barrier: Polythene coated Aluminum Tape (0.3mm ±15%, min 3mm overlap)

mandatory_tests: Mechanical Tests: Polythene for conductor insulation, Dielectric constant/permittivity, Volume resistivity of petroleum jelly, Permittivity of petroleum jelly, Poly-Al tape thickness, Sheath thickness, Diameter over Sheath, Variation between max/min diameter over sheath, Elongation and tensile strength of conductor insulation, Conductor thickness, Annealing of conductor, Cable bend test, Water penetration test

Electrical Tests (Low Frequency): Continuity of conductors, Conductor resistance (86 ± 6 Ohms/km), Resistance unbalance (1 avg / 2.5 individual), Resistance of poly-al tape, Mutual capacitance (52 ± 3 nF/km @ 800-1000Hz), Capacitance unbalance (Pair to Pair) (≤ 50 pF/km avg), Capacitance unbalance (Pair to Gnd) (≤ 750 pF/km avg), Dielectric strength between conductors (2.4 KV DC for 3 Sec.), Dielectric strength between conductors and shield (5.0 KV DC for 3 Sec.), Insulation resistance (Min 5000 MΩ-KM @ 500 V DC for 1 Min), Dielectric strength of sheath (17KV DC or 11KV RMS AC)
high_frequency_tests: Equal level far end cross talk (Better than 55dB/km)
Attenuation (8.25 dB/km max avg @ 20 deg C)

marking.sheath: Manufacturers name, No. of pairs and dia of conductor, Length (sequential marking), Year of manufacture, “TELECOM SDSC”

product_families.description: Flame Retardant Low Smoke Armoured Telephone Cables

technical_specifications.armouring: GS Round wire (IS:3975), Single layer, ≥ 0.9 mm size
technical_specifications.outer_sheath_material: FRLS PVC type- TM-2 (IS:13176) or ST1 (IS:5831)”

mandatory_tests: Electrical Tests: Conductor Resistance (86 ± 6 ohms/km), Min Insulation resistance (50M.ohms/km), High Voltage test (2KV RMS for 1 minute), Capacitance Unbalance (pair to pair) (≤ 230PF)

special_requirements: Jelly filled compound for moisture protection
Armouring with Galvanized steel tape or round wire
Flame Retardant Low Smoke (FRLS) properties for specific cable type
Sequential length marking on sheath at 1-meter intervals
Hot stamping with SDSC SHAR authority stamp
Cable winding on strong wooden drums

commercial_constraints.payment_terms: 100% after receipt and acceptance of materials
commercial_constraints.penalty_clause: 0.5% per week of undelivered portion, max 10% of contract value
commercial_constraints.warranty_period: Minimum one year from date of acceptance

quality_assurance.inspection: Pre-delivery inspection at factory/online video mode, clearance required before dispatch. Random drum selection for testing. Minimum 50% of ordered quantity to be tested in presence of SDSC SHAR authorities.
quality_assurance.test_certificates: Relevant standard test certificates/data sheets complying with technical specifications are required.
